Myriad Migrated to Apache Git

Sep 24, 2015

The final legal hurdles to finally donating the codebase to the Apache Software Foundation have been overcome. (Thanks EBay and PayPal!) The codebase now resides in the Apache git infrastructure. Please clone this and use it from now on. The old github repo is now no longer used, however pull requests may still be submitted through the official Apache Github mirror.

Official Repo

Github mirror

Project Enters Incubation

Feb 28, 2015

Myriad project has been accepted into the Apache Software Foundation Incubation process. Please have a look at our proposal.

Incubator Status

Join us on Freenode IRC #myriad
